name: Aluminum Steering Linkage Set
description: Upgrades plastic steering arms to aluminum for better durability and response.

name: Brass Diff Covers
description: Adds front-end weight for better crawling traction and axle protection.

name: Oil-Filled Shocks (Adjustable)
description: Improves suspension dampening and control on rocky terrain.

name: Tires
description: High-traction crawler tires for superior grip on rocky terrain.

name: Beadlock Wheels
description: Secure your tires with style and strength using beadlock wheels.

name: LED Light Kit
description: Illuminate your crawler’s path for nighttime rock crawling adventures.

name: Brass Portal Hubs
description: Add lower center gravity weight for improved climbing balance.

name: Steel Driveshafts
description: Reinforced driveshafts to handle extreme torque and performance.

name: Upgraded Servo
description: Powerful servo for quicker and more precise steering response.

name: Metal Gear Transmission
description: All-metal gears for durability under load and extended runtime.

name: Chassis Brace Kit
description: Reinforce the crawler frame for rigidity and stability.

name: Skid Plate Set
description: Protect your rig’s underside from rocks and debris.

name: Aluminum Shock Towers
description: Enhance suspension tuning and chassis strength.

name: Waterproof ESC
description: Run through water and mud without worry with this waterproof ESC.

name: CNC Steering Knuckles
description: Precision-machined knuckles for smoother, stronger steering geometry.
